<column gap="tiny">

**Perception** +16

[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43)

[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +16, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +18, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +16, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +18, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +19, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +14, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +16

</row>

[_+1 dagger_](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [lesser maestro's lute](/Equipment.aspx?ID=260), 12 gp

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_dagger_ +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 piercing

**Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 26, attack +18
- **Cantrips (4th)**
[Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Floating Disk](/Spells.aspx?ID=124), [Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266), [Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291) (3 slots)
- **2nd**
[Comprehend Language](/Spells.aspx?ID=46), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197), [Telekinetic Maneuver](/Spells.aspx?ID=333) (3 slots)
- **3rd**
[Dream Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=90), [Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=104), [Sound Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=292) (3 slotst)
- **4th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315) (3 slots)

**Bard Composition Spells 2 Focus Points,** DC 26
- **1st**
[Counter Performance](/Spells.aspx?ID=381), [Inspire Courage](/Spells.aspx?ID=386)
- **3rd**
[Dirge of Doom](/Spells.aspx?ID=382)

</column>
name: Annamede Belavarah
